Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Grips = { Equipped = CFrame.new(0, 0, 2, -1, -0, 8.10038e-006, -8.10038e-006, 0, -1, 0, -1, -0), Spin = CFrame.new(0, 0, 2, -8.10004508e-007, -1, -8.10004713e-006, 1, -8.10004565e-007, -6.5610746e-012, 0, -8.10004803e-006, 0.99999994) }
Animations = { Slash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 1.5, Damage = 15}, SpinPose = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("SpinPose"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = 5, Damage = 30} }
Sounds = { Unsheath = Handle:WaitForChild("Unsheath"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), Lunge = Handle:WaitForChild("Lunge"), Woosh = Handle:WaitForChild("Woosh"), Tornado = Handle:WaitForChild("Tornado") }
Gravity = 196.20
Damage = 5 TornadoDamage = 25
Equipped = false
Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false
SecondaryAttack = { Enabled = true, Active = false, ReloadTime = 5 }
CurrentAnimation = nil
Special = { Enabled = true, Active = false, Duration = 20, ReloadTime = 20, Damage = 10, }
MovementRate = (1 / 30)
TransparentObjects = {}
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player and Equipped and CheckIfAlive() then if Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if Key == "q" and Down then if Special.Enabled and not Special.Active and Tool.Enabled then Special.Enabled = false Special.Active = true local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ActivatedToolUnequipped then ActivatedToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ActivatedToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false if ActivatedToolUnequipped then ActivatedToolUnequipped:disconnect() end end) local CoordinateFrame = InvokeClient("CoordinateFrame", nil) local ForwardVector = CFrame.new(Head.Position, Vector3.new(CoordinateFrame.p.X, Head.Position.Y, CoordinateFrame.p.Z)).lookVector * 50 local UpVector = ForwardVector + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * 75 local NewCoordinateFrame = CFrame.new((Head.CFrame + UpVector).p, Head.Position) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) InvokeClient("SetCamera", {CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable, CoordinateFrame = NewCoordinateFrame}) TransparentObjects = SetParentTransparency(Character, 1) Humanoid.AutoRotate = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 InvokeClient("DisableJump", true) TornadoPart = BasePart:Clone() TornadoPart.Name = "Tornado" TornadoPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) TornadoPart.CanCollide = false local TornadoWeldPart = TornadoPart:Clone() TornadoWeldPart.Transparency = 1 TornadoWeldPart.Name = "WeldPart" TornadoWeldPart.Parent = TornadoPart local TornadoMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") TornadoMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh TornadoMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102638417" TornadoMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102638520" TornadoMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(9, 9, 9) TornadoMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) TornadoMesh.Parent = TornadoPart local TornadoMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") TornadoMotor.Part0 = TornadoPart TornadoMotor.Part1 = TornadoWeldPart TornadoMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) TornadoMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 11, 0) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) TornadoMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.1 local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = TornadoWeldPart Weld.Part1 = Torso Weld.Parent = TornadoWeldPart local Speed = 250 local MaxSpeed = 1000 local DesiredAngle = (99999999999 * (-Speed / math.abs(Speed))) local MaxVelocity = (Speed / MaxSpeed) TornadoMotor.MaxVelocity = MaxVelocity TornadoMotor.DesiredAngle = DesiredAngle TornadoMotor.Parent = TornadoPart TornadoPart.Parent = Character RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() RemoverClone.Name = (player.Name.."'s" .. Remover.Name) local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = player Creator.Parent = RemoverClone local Model = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Model.Name = "Model" Model.Value = TornadoPart Model.Parent = RemoverClone RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local Mass = (GetTotalMass(Character) * Gravity) BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new((Mass * 10), 0, (Mass * 10)) BodyPosition.position = Torso.Position BodyPosition.Parent = Torso BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = Torso BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = Torso local DurationTick = tick() Sounds.Tornado:Play() while (tick() - DurationTick) < Special.Duration and CurrentlyEquipped and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and TornadoPart and TornadoPart.Parent and BodyPosition and BodyPosition.Parent do local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") BodyPosition.position = Torso.Position + CFrame.new(TornadoPart.Position, MousePosition).lookVector * 15 local RayHit, RayPos = RayCast((Torso.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.Y / 2), 0)).p, CFrame.new(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(MousePosition.X, Torso.Position.Y, MousePosition.Z)).lookVector, (Torso.Size.Z * 3), {Character}) if RayHit then BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, Mass * 100, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 12.5, 0) else BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end local Humanoids = GetPlayersNearby(6, Torso, {Character}) for i, v in pairs(Humanoids) do if v and v.Parent and v.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(v) TagHumanoid(v, Player) v:TakeDamage(TornadoDamage) end end wait(MovementRate) end if CurrentlyEquipped then Sounds.Tornado:Stop() for i, v in pairs({BodyAngularVelocity, BodyPosition, BodyVelocity, BodyGyro, TornadoPart}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end InvokeClient("DisableJump", false) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.AutoRotate = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end for i, v in pairs(TransparentObjects) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then v.Object.Transparency = v.Transparency end end TransparentObjects = {} end Special.Active = false wait(Special.ReloadTime) Special.Enabled = true end end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function CheckTableForInstance(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function GetPlayersNearby(Radius, Object, Ignore) local Radius = (Radius / 2) local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new(Radius, Radius, Radius) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new(Radius, Radius, Radius) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(Object.CFrame.p - NegativePartRadius, Object.CFrame.p + PositivePartRadius), Ignore, 100) local Humanoids = {} for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local character = v.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTableForInstance(Humanoids, humanoid) then local ForceFieldExists = false for i, v in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ForceField") then ForceFieldExists = true end end if not ForceFieldExists then table.insert(Humanoids, humanoid) end end end end return Humanoids end
function SetParentTransparency(Parent, Transparency) local Objects = {} local function SetTransparency(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do local TransparencyExists = false pcall(function() local Property = v["Transparency"] TransparencyExists = true end) if TransparencyExists then table.insert(Objects, {Object = v, Transparency = v.Transparency}) v.Transparency = Transparency end SetTransparency(v) end end SetTransparency(Parent) return Objects end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Part) Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not Equipped or not CheckIfAlive() or Special.Active then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or (RightGrip.Part0 ~= Handle and RightGrip.Part1 ~= Handle) then return end local character = Hit.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local DamageValue = ((CurrentAnimation and CurrentAnimation.Damage) or Damage) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(DamageValue) end end) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Equipped or SecondaryAttack.Active or Special.Active then return end Clicks = (Clicks + 1) if not FirstClick then FirstClick = true local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(0.15) if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end Tool.Enabled = false CurrentAnimation = (((Clicks > 1 and SecondaryAttack.Enabled and not SecondaryAttack.Active) and Animations.SpinPose) or Animations.Slash) if CurrentAnimation == Animations.Slash then Sounds.Slash:Play() elseif CurrentAnimation == Animations.SpinPose then SecondaryAttack.Enabled = false SecondaryAttack.Active = true Humanoid.AutoRotate = false Tool.Grip = Grips.Spin Sounds.Woosh:Play() local Mass = (GetTotalMass(Character) * Gravity * 100) BodyAngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, Mass, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 30, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.Parent = Torso end InvokeClient("DisableJump", true) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", CurrentAnimation) wait(CurrentAnimation.Duration) Sounds.Woosh:Stop() SecondaryAttack.Active = false Delay(SecondaryAttack.ReloadTime, function() SecondaryAttack.Enabled = true end) if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped if BodyAngularVelocity and BodyAngularVelocity.Parent then BodyAngularVelocity:Destroy() end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.AutoRotate = true end InvokeClient("DisableJump", false) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", CurrentAnimation) CurrentAnimation = nil FirstClick = false Clicks = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Head and Head.Parent and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:WaitForChild("Head") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped Sounds.Unsheath:Play() end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false CurrentAnimation = nil if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.AutoRotate = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end for i, v in pairs(TransparentObjects) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then v.Object.Transparency = v.Transparency end end TransparentObjects = {} for i, v in pairs({BodyAngularVelocity, BodyPosition, BodyVelocity, BodyGyro, TornadoPart}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped, ActivatedToolUnequipped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.Parent then InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do if v and v.Parent then v:Stop() InvokeClient("StopSound", v) end end end
Blow(Handle)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FixCamera = script:WaitForChild("FixCamera")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") Model = script:FindFirstChild("Model")
function DestroyModel() if Creator and Creator.Parent then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false if Character and Character.Parent then FixCameraClone.Parent = Character else local Backpack = Creator:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end end Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Model or not Model.Value or not Model.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Creator = Creator.Value Model = Model.Value
Character = Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Model.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
Camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
Player = (((script.Parent:IsA("Model") and Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(script.Parent)) or (script.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and script.Parent.Parent)) or nil) if Player then Character = Player.Character if Character then Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid then Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid end end end
DestroyScript()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "CoordinateFrame" then return Camera.CoordinateFrame elseif Mode == "SetCamera" and (Value.CameraType or Value.CoordinateFrame) then if Value.CameraType then Camera.CameraType = Value.CameraType end if Value.CoordinateFrame then Camera.CoordinateFrame = Value.CoordinateFrame end elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
